original_text: Jeshua was the father of Joiakim. Joiakim was the father of Eliashib. Eliashib was the father of Joiada,
korean_text: 예수아는 요야김을 낳고 요야김은 엘리아십을 낳고 엘리아십은 요야다를 낳고

sentences.original_text: Jeshua was the father of Joiakim
Joiakim was the father of Eliashib
Eliashib was the father of Joiada
